job description:
Senior Data Scientist

We are looking for a Senior Data Scientist with a passion for machine learning and predictive analytics to provide leadership to a Fortune 500 Financial organization in San Francisco, CA. Our client is creating a world-class team of top notch professionals. In this highly visible role, lead through your technical expertise and superior project management skills. We offer competitive benefits and up to $120,000 per year including the opportunity to drive change.

Are you motivated by sharing your knowledge of code and machine learning algorithms with an entire organization? Seek out new applications for machine learning within the company, and work with team members to take your ideas to pilot stage and beyond.

Analytics Consultant candidates will possess a Masters degree or higher in Computer Sciences, Statistics, Engineering, Applied Math, Physics, Economics, Econometrics, and/or have 5+ years of experience in analytics, and/or modeling.

You will also need 2+ years of experience of each of the following: Python, Quantitative machine learning techniques, and SQL. We prefer candidates with Keras, Tensorflow, and/or Theano.

To apply for this exciting cutting edge opportunity, ask for Lisa for immediate consideration for this opportunity with this global client.
